note.p: Birth: Southampton Street, Bloomsbury, London, England (23 September 1743)
Death: His house in Vernon Place, Bloomsbury Square, London (18 March 1817)
Burial: Bloomsbury cemetery, Brunswick Square, London
Education: Harrow School; MD (1784, University of Glasgow)
Career: Took over his father's business as an apothecary (1768); practiced as an acchouceur (after 1784); Physician to the British Lying-in Hospital (1789); was associated with William Hunter
